title: Netsuzou TRap (Netsuzou Trap -NTR-)
synopsis: High school students Yuma Okazaki and Hotaru Mizushina are childhood friends. With their respective boyfriends, Takeda and Fujiwara, their lives couldn't be more perfect. From playing in school to going on group dates, it seems nothing can break their bond.
voices: ['Igarashi, Hiromi', 'Kakuma, Ai', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Oosaka, Ryouta', 'Kasahara, Akira', 'Yamaguchi, Shouhei']
staff: [['Hirasawa, Hisayoshi', ['Director', ' Sound Director']], ['Kodama, Naoko', ['Original Creator']], ['Nakatake, Manabu', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['ISAO', ['Music']]]
